lead_paragraph: Von Miller declared just 12 hours after winning the Super Bowl MVP award that his contract talks this offseason were "going to be a peaceful thing" that he wouldn't fret over.

headline.print_headline: Von Miller Confident a Deal Will Be Reached Soon
headline.main: Von Miller Confident a Deal Will Be Reached Soon
